node.title: Growing Terminology: What Does It Mean?
node.description: With all kinds of terminology being used, deciphering the "growing" language can be quite the conundrum. This class will help you to see the strengths and weakness of permaculture, biodynamics, Reams, Albrecht, organic, veganic, and common conventional growing methods. We will also discuss terminology such as synthetic, safe, natural, easy, NPK, nutrient dense and more. The end result of all growing should be safe and nutritious produce/crops that glorify the Lord.
